description: This file defines a theme configuration class 'OceanTheme' for a Flutter application, including color schemes, UI style constants, and theme data for light mode.

classes.name: OceanTheme
classes.description: A class encapsulating theme colors, constants, and methods to generate a Flutter ThemeData object with a custom 'ocean' style.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured with the OceanTheme's color scheme, component shapes, and styles for a light theme.

methods.name: headerGradient
methods.description: Provides a linear gradient used for headers and app bars in the application.

methods.name: softSurfaceGradient
methods.description: Provides a gradient used for empty or illustration-like states within the UI.
